name: sydai
description: SydAI - AI-powered application with authentication and services

scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:server
scripts.build:frontend: test -d frontend && cd frontend && npm run build || echo 'Frontend directory not found, skipping'
scripts.build:server: echo 'Server is Node.js - no build needed'
scripts.install:all: for dir in frontend server database ai_services; do [ -d "$dir" ] && [ -f "$dir/package.json" ] && (cd "$dir" && npm install) || echo "Skipping $dir"; done
